author: Odeinoichus
title: Fun Polybag Excitement in Cloud Cuckoo Land.
review:
Set #30406 Unikitty Roller Coaster Wagon: Here’s a fun Unikitty themed Polybag that features a nice solid model and a unique facial print for the character of Unikitty. I found this at Toy’s-R-Us in Canada, I suspect it may be made available as a free gift during Bricktober, though I wouldn’t be sure on that. Still it’s a nice little companion piece to the larger Roller Coaster set. (Which I have not picked up yet, so I can’t be sure if this wagon will fit on the Roller Coaster Tracks.)

Pros:

  • Unikitty has a nice wide-eyed facial print with a smile and fits solidly into the model.
  • Roller Coaster Wagon is a great looking model that features a disc launcher first introduced in the Legends of Chima theme.
  • Build is fun and easy to construct and play with.

Cons:

  • Not yet easy to find.
  • Model may or may not fit on the roller coaster track.
  • Disc launcher is odd play feature to include with Unikitty.

Overall opinion

If you’re a fan of Unikitty I’d definitely recommend this set as it does feature some great simplistic design choices and is very fun to build and play with. Unikitty also features a nice new facial print and her new model design makes her head attachment much more solid. Recommended.

author: StevenTheBrick
title: Unikitty Roller Coaster Wagon
review:
2/5

 

Meh building experience. Weak parts. Ok playability. Not really good price, as there are better ways to get Unikitty than a roller coaster  wagon.
